text:
Get ready to improve your vocabulary and speak 
English with a real life conversation between me

and Vanessa from Speak English with Vanessa!
Here's how it works: you will watch a couple

clips of a conversation between us 
from the new Beyond Borders Talk Show.

Then you will learn all of the most important 
vocabulary, pronunciation and more, before finally

testing everything that you've learned by 
watching a final time without subtitles.

And if you are new here, every week we make 
lessons that help you have fun and understand fast

native speech, without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes and without subtitles,

so that you can communicate confidently, like 
Anna, who says that she was about to give up

before she found our channel. Now she's 
having fun and can understand and even speak!

We want to help you on your journey 
too, so join our community of over

4 Million subscribers by hitting that 
Subscribe button and the Bell down below.

Alright, so if you are enjoying this lesson I want 
to let you know that it is just an excerpt from

our new Beyond Borders Talk Show, where I will 
guide you outside of the classroom and into the

real world with insights from some of the world's 
best teachers, language learners, innovators

and global citizens, helping you to reach your 
highest potential in your English and your life!

Does that sound? Like 
something that you want to do?

Then I want to invite you to download 
the full interview with Vanessa
for FREE in the description below, and we also

have another video lesson with her on our 
RealLife English channel here on YouTube,

that you will have a lot of fun learning with.
That's also linked down in the description.

How would you like to develop 
real life speaking confidence

at the touch of a button by 
speaking with other learners

while making friends across cultures?
I bet this all sounds like a dream, right?

Well, now with the RealLife App 
it will be a dream come true!

You can download the RealLife App 
for FREE and approve your listening

and speaking whenever and wherever you want.
Just click the link in the description below

or you can search for the RealLife English App in 
the Google Play or Apple App Store now and let us

guide you beyond the classroom to live, learn 
and speak English in the real world! Aww yeah!!
